briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of Lovaza (Omega-3-Acid Ethyl Esters) in Recurrent, Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Lovaza for the Prevention of Recurrent, Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of Omacor (omega-3-acid ethyl esters) in patients with recurrent, symptomatic atrial fibrillation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Paroxysmal AF With an Event of Documented Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation (AF)/Flutter
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug (Day 1) to the first symptomatic recurrence of AF/flutter (up to Week 24)
